ygData.subject: Re: AAAAAACCCCCCCCKKKKKKKK!!!!!!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: I also think this armor should be no drp. C mon, bronze armor is given away now on cazik thule, and It used to be hard to get hold of. What few newbies there
ygData.messageBody:
I also think this armor should be no drp. C'mon, bronze armor is given away
now on cazik thule, and It used to be hard to get hold of. What few newbies
there are have at least banded on. All have become worthless. I would like
to see twinkability limited to the bronze. I think if you want this armor,
you should have to go get it yourself. I have no clue what they are
thinking....
----- Original Message -----
From: Wilson, ThomasX B <thomasx.b.wilson@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, October 29, 1999 1:38 PM
Subject: RE: [shadowknight] AAAAAACCCCCCCCKKKKKKKK!!!!!!!!!!!


> From: "Wilson, ThomasX B" <thomasx.b.wilson@...>
>
> Hmm this is disturbing.. I liked the fact that lowbies couldn't get the
> armor unless they did it themselves. My opinion is that all class specific
> armor should be No Drop, if you can't do the quest with the character that
> will be wearing the armor then you shouldn't have it. (But of course i'm
one
> of those that thinks there should be level limits on armor and equipment
> anyway.. I hate seeing lvl 10 and under Sk's with a DR or similar)..
>
> Anyway... I think I'll feedback it as well when I get on tonight..
>
> Oh something that was kind of bugging me, is there anyway to delete a
spell
> from your spell book? The since the new lifetaps didn't overwrite the
> existing spells I still have them in my book (and obviously can't use
> them).. I've moved them to like page 15 or so, but would like to delete
> them. Any ideas?
>
> Enjoy
>
> Thomas
>
>
